doc.description: Compute optical flow. Made for Linux video Devices. Computes x and y velocity using optical flow and distance to ground (using sonar).

define.name: AGL_ID
define.description: ABI receive id for ABI message (sonar measurement) (default: ABI_BROADCAST)

define.name: SEND_ABI_ID
define.description: ABI sender id for opticflow messages (default: 1)

define.name: CAMERA
define.description: The V4L2 camera device that is used for the calculations

define.name: DEROTATION_CORRECTION_FACTOR_X
define.description: Correction factor for derotation (in x direction), estimated from a fit between the gyro's rates and the resulting flow (caused by the camera not being exactly in the middle (Defaults are from an ARDrone 2)

define.name: DEROTATION_CORRECTION_FACTOR_Y
define.description: Correction factor for derotation (in y direction), estimated from a fit between the gyro's rates and the resulting flow (caused by the camera not being exactly in the middle (Defaults are from an ARDrone 2)

configure.name: BODY_TO_CAM_PHI
configure.description: Rotation from body frame to camera frame around x axis

configure.name: BODY_TO_CAM_THETA
configure.description: Rotation from body frame to camera frame around y axis

configure.name: BODY_TO_CAM_PSI
configure.description: Rotation from body frame to camera frame around z axis

define.name: METHOD
define.description: Method used to calculate optical flow

define.name: WINDOW_SIZE
define.description: Window size used for block matching (pixels)

define.name: SEARCH_DISTANCE
define.description: Maximum search distance for blockmatching (pixels)

define.name: SUBPIXEL_FACTOR
define.description: Amount of subpixels per pixel, used for more precise (subpixel) calculations of the flow

define.name: RESOLUTION_FACTOR
define.description: The resolution factor needed to calculate the divergence without floats

define.name: DEROTATION
define.description: Derotation either turned on or off (depended on gyroscope measurements)

define.name: MEDIAN_FILTER
define.description: A median filter on the resulting velocities to be turned on or off (last 5 measurements)

define.name: FEATURE_MANAGEMENT
define.description: Whether to keep already tracked corners in memory for the next frame or re-detect new ones every time

define.name: FPS
define.description: The (maximum) frequency to run the calculations at. If zero, it will max out at the camera frame rate

define.name: TRACK_BACK
define.description: Whether flow vectors are tracked back to the previous image and only kept if they end up close to the original point.

define.name: SHOW_FLOW
define.description: Whether to draw the flow vectors in the image.

define.name: MAX_TRACK_CORNERS
define.description: The maximum amount of corners the Lucas Kanade algorithm is tracking between two frames

define.name: MAX_ITERATIONS
define.description: Maximum number of iterations the Lucas Kanade algorithm should take

define.name: THRESHOLD_VEC
define.description: TThreshold in subpixels when the iterations of Lucas Kanade should stop

define.name: CORNER_METHOD
define.description: Method used to look for corners, exhaustive FAST (0) or ACT-FAST (1).

define.name: FAST9_ADAPTIVE
define.description: Whether we should use and adapative FAST9 crner detection threshold

define.name: FAST9_THRESHOLD
define.description: FAST9 default threshold

define.name: FAST9_MIN_DISTANCE
define.description: The amount of pixels between corners that should be detected

define.name: FAST9_PADDING
define.description: The outer border in which no corners will be searched

define.name: FAST9_REGION_DETECT
define.description: Whether to detect fast9 corners in regions of interest or the whole image (only works with feature management)

define.name: FAST9_NUM_REGIONS
define.description: The number of regions of interest to split the image into

define.name: ACTFAST_LONG_STEP
define.description: Step size to take when there is no texture

define.name: ACTFAST_SHORT_STEP
define.description: Step size to take when there is an edge to be followed

define.name: ACTFAST_MIN_GRADIENT
define.description: Threshold that decides when there is sufficient texture for edge following

define.name: ACTFAST_GRADIENT_METHOD
define.description: Whether to use a simple (0) or Sobel (1) filter
